modules.name: Phi
modules.description: Addressable and clockable value or chord sequencer whose data can be modified using expanders.

modules.name: Via
modules.description: Does nothing by itself. The signals passing thru via can be modified using compatible expanders.

modules.name: Arr
modules.description: An expandable array of quantizable values into a polyphonic signal whose data can be modified using expanders.

modules.name: Coerce
modules.description: Quantize an incoming polyphonic signal to voltages of another polyphonic signal.

modules.name: Coerce6
modules.description: Quantize incoming polyphonic signals to voltages of another polyphonic signal.

modules.name: Spike
modules.description: Addressable and clockable gate sequencer compatible with expanders to modify the sequence.

modules.name: ReX
modules.description: Input expander for several SIM modules, modifying start and length of the data inside the expandable.

modules.name: InX
modules.description: Input expander for several SIM modules. Can overwrite or insert data inside the expanded module.

modules.name: OutX
modules.description: Output expander for several SIM modules. Can copy or substract data from the expanded module.

modules.name: Bank
modules.description: An expandable bank of 16 On/Off values. Compatible with SIM expanders.

modules.name: ModX
modules.description: Modify Glide, Repeats and chance for Spike and Phi.

modules.name: OpX
modules.description: Input expander for Phi and Spike.

modules.name: GaitX
modules.description: Output expander for Phi and Spike. Outputs current step, step phase and EOC.

modules.name: DebugX
modules.description: Output meant for debugging SIM modules.
